targets.query:
from(bucket: "{{ bucket_name }}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["function"] == "__x64_sys_read")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pod_namespace"] == "$namespace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pod_name"] =~ /^*$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "length")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "function")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "host")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "_start")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "_stop")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "_measurement")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "_start")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "_stop")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: sum, column: "length")

from(bucket: "{{ bucket_name }}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["function"] == "__x64_sys_write")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pod_namespace"] == "$namespace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pod_name"] =~ /^*$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "length")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "function")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "host")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "_start")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "_stop")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "_measurement")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "_start")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "_stop")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: sum, column: "length")

from(bucket: "{{ bucket_name }}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["function"] == "tcp_recvmsg")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pod_namespace"] == "$namespace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pod_name"] =~ /^*$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "length")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "function")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "host")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "_start")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "_stop")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "_measurement")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "_start")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "_stop")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: sum, column: "length")

from(bucket: "{{ bucket_name }}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["function"] == "tcp_sendmsg")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pod_namespace"] == "$namespace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pod_name"] =~ /^*$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "length")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "function")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "host")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "_start")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "_stop")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "_measurement")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "_start")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "_stop")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: sum, column: "length")

from(bucket: "{{ bucket_name }}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["function"] == "tcp_connect")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pod_namespace"] == "$namespace")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pod_name"] =~ /^*$/)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with connections: 1 }))
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "function")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "host")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "_start")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "_stop")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "_measurement")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "pod_name", "pod_chart", "pod_namespace", "connections"])
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "_start")
  |> drop(fn: (column) => column == "_stop")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: count, column: "connections")

from(bucket: "{{ bucket_name }}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["function"] == "tcp_connect")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sock_daddr" 
    or r["_field"] == "sock_saddr" or r["_field"] == "sock_dest_object" or r["_field"] == "sock_src_object"
    or r["_field"] == "sock_src_chart"
    or r["_field"] == "sock_dest_chart"
    )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pod_namespace"] == "$namespace")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with connections: 1 }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with k8s_src: r.sock_src_object}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with k8s_dest: r.sock_dest_object}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with src: r.sock_saddr}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with dest: r.sock_daddr}))
  |> keep(columns: ["connections", "src", "k8s_src", "dest", "k8s_dest", "sock_src_chart", "sock_dest_chart", "pod_name"])
  |> group(columns: ["src", "k8s_src", "dest", "k8s_dest", "sock_src_chart", "sock_dest_chart", "pod_name"])
  |> count(column: "connections")

from(bucket: "{{ bucket_name }}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["function"] == "tcp_sendmsg")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sock_daddr" 
    or r["_field"] == "sock_saddr" or r["_field"] == "sock_dest_object" 
    or r["_field"] == "sock_src_object"
    or r["_field"] == "sock_src_chart"
    or r["_field"] == "sock_dest_chart"
     or r["_field"] == "count"
 )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pod_namespace"] == "$namespace")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with k8s_src: r.sock_src_object}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with k8s_dest: r.sock_dest_object}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with src: r.sock_saddr}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with dest: r.sock_daddr}))
  |> keep(columns: ["count", "src", "k8s_src", "dest", "k8s_dest", "sock_src_chart", "sock_dest_chart", "pod_name"])
  |> group(columns: ["src", "k8s_src", "dest", "k8s_dest", "sock_src_chart", "sock_dest_chart", "pod_name"])
  |> sum(column: "count")

from(bucket: "{{ bucket_name }}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["function"] == "tcp_recvmsg")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sock_daddr" 
    or r["_field"] == "sock_saddr" or r["_field"] == "sock_dest_object" or r["_field"] == "sock_src_object"
    or r["_field"] == "sock_src_chart"
    or r["_field"] == "sock_dest_chart"
    or r["_field"] == "count"
 )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pod_namespace"] == "$namespace")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with k8s_src: r.sock_src_object}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with k8s_dest: r.sock_dest_object}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with src: r.sock_saddr}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with dest: r.sock_daddr}))
  |> keep(columns: ["count", "src", "k8s_src", "dest", "k8s_dest", "sock_src_chart", "sock_dest_chart", "pod_name"])
  |> group(columns: ["src", "k8s_src", "dest", "k8s_dest", "sock_src_chart", "sock_dest_chart", "pod_name"])
  |> sum(column: "count")

from(bucket: "{{ bucket_name }}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["function"] == "tcp_sendmsg")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sock_daddr" or r["_field"] == "length"
    or r["_field"] == "sock_saddr" or r["_field"] == "sock_dest_object" 
    or r["_field"] == "sock_src_object"
    or r["_field"] == "sock_src_chart"
    or r["_field"] == "sock_dest_chart"
    )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pod_namespace"] == "$namespace")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with k8s_src: r.sock_src_object}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with k8s_dest: r.sock_dest_object}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with src: r.sock_saddr}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with dest: r.sock_daddr}))
  |> keep(columns: ["length", "src", "k8s_src", "dest", "k8s_dest", "sock_src_chart", "sock_dest_chart", "pod_name"])
  |> group(columns: ["src", "k8s_src", "dest", "k8s_dest", "sock_src_chart", "sock_dest_chart", "pod_name"])
  |> sum(column: "length")

from(bucket: "{{ bucket_name }}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["function"] == "tcp_recvmsg")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sock_daddr" or r["_field"] == "length"
    or r["_field"] == "sock_saddr" or r["_field"] == "sock_dest_object" or r["_field"] == "sock_src_object"
    or r["_field"] == "sock_src_chart"
    or r["_field"] == "sock_dest_chart"
    )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pod_namespace"] == "$namespace")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with k8s_src: r.sock_src_object}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with k8s_dest: r.sock_dest_object}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with src: r.sock_saddr}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with dest: r.sock_daddr}))
  |> keep(columns: ["length", "src", "k8s_src", "dest", "k8s_dest", "sock_src_chart", "sock_dest_chart", "pod_name"])
  |> group(columns: ["src", "k8s_src", "dest", "k8s_dest", "sock_src_chart", "sock_dest_chart", "pod_name"])
  |> sum(column: "length")
